text: Koo, shikaboolelakhwo amakhuwa kabalia bali imbeli wabu, Abandu ba Nuh nende Aâ€™adi nende Thamud, nende Abandu ba Ibraheem nende Abandu na Madyan, nende Abandu beshialo shiabu shiakalukhanibwa hasi yaba hekulu? Abarumwa babu babeetsela nende ebifune bili habulafu, ne Nyasaye shiyabakholela obubii tawe halali abeene nibobekholela obubii
